translations: v.退还（部分还款）；用槽口衔接；减少；使变钝（rebate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Manufacture of rebated doors needs some special machines and technology different from those for making traditional doors.
sentences.translation: “T”型门的生产工艺及生产设备不同于普通的传统门，有其特殊的关键技术。

sentences.sentence: If you are not in good control of time or cannot set priorities for different matters, what you do is surely to be rebated.
sentences.translation: 不能充分掌握时间或者不能区分事情的缓急先后，你的一切都会打折扣。

sentences.sentence: Note 1: Monthly interest will be calculated as the Rule of 78. For early settlement, 50% of the remaining interest will be rebated.
sentences.translation: 附注1： 每月利息之计算方法依照七十八规则。 而提早偿还贷款会退回剩馀期数利息之50%。
